name: Ad Astra Adventures- Dungeon Escape!
description:
Ad Astra Adventures is a 2D platformer, Space themed game. find your way out of a space dungeon by looking for hidden keys. 

Gameplay includes looking for hidden keys; check out crates in the dungeon to find keys to escape.

Watch your step! beware of bombs in the way.

Collect Crystals for a higher score.
